lemma (in Module) fsps_chain_boundTr2:"\<And>x. \<lbrakk>R module N; free_generator R M H; f \<in> H \<rightarrow> carrier N; C \<subseteq> fsps R M N f H; \<forall>a\<in>C. \<forall>b\<in>C. fst a \<subseteq> fst b \<or> fst b \<subseteq> fst a; x \<in> (fgs R M (\<Union>{a. \<exists>b. (a, b) \<in> C})); C \<noteq> {}\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> (THE y. y \<in> carrier N \<and> (\<exists>a b. (a, b) \<in> C \<and> x \<in> fgs R M a \<and> y = b x)) \<in> (carrier N) \<and> (\<exists>a1 b1. (a1, b1) \<in> C \<and> x \<in> fgs R M a1 \<and> (THE y. y \<in> carrier N \<and> (\<exists>a b. (a, b) \<in> C \<and> x \<in> fgs R M a \<and> y = b x)) = b1 x)"
